content: Gee — the left claims that voter fraud hardly, if ever, happens — even though certain precincts in Detroit, Cleveland, Chicago and St. Louis routinely report more ballots cast than registered voters. Here’s a link to left-leaning Detroit News story http://www.detroitnews.com/story/news/politics/2016/12/12/records-many-votes-detroits-precincts/95363314/ So what’s your beef then about having i.d. to vote?
